Race.SummaryText:
PARISHWIDE PROPOSITION
(MILLAGE RENEWAL) 
(ROADS AND BRIDGES)

SUMMARY:  PARISHWIDE 10-YEAR 4.89-MILL TAX RENEWAL FOR CONSTRUCTING, MAINTAINING AND REPAIRING PUBLIC ROADS AND BRIDGES IN MOREHOUSE PARISH.
Race.FullText: Shall the Parish of Morehouse, State of Louisiana, under the provisions of Article VI, Sections 30 and 32 of the Constitution of the State of Louisiana of 1974, continue to levy and collect a special tax of four and eighty-nine hundredths (4.89) mills on all the property subject to taxation within said Parish, for a period of ten (10) years beginning with the year 2009 and ending with the year 2018, inclusive, for the purpose of constructing, maintaining and repairing public roads and bridges in the Parish, title to which shall be in the public? (estimated annual revenues: $659,000)

Race.SummaryText:
PARISHWIDE PROPOSITION 
(MILLAGE RENEWAL) 
(DRAINAGE)

SUMMARY:  PARISHWIDE 10-YEAR 2.23-MILL TAX RENEWAL FOR MAINTAINING DRAINAGE CANALS AND DITCHES IN MOREHOUSE PARISH, AND FOR ACQUIRING, MAINTAINING AND/OR OPERATING DRAINAGE MACHINERY AND EQUIPMENT.
Race.FullText: Shall the Parish of Morehouse, State of Louisiana, under the provisions of Article VI, Sections 30 and 32 of the Constitution of the State of Louisiana of 1974, continue to levy and collect a special tax of two and twenty-three hundredths (2.23) mills on all the property subject to taxation within said Parish, for a period of ten (10) years beginning with the year 2008 and ending with the year 2017, inclusive, for the purpose of maintaining drainage canals and ditches, and for acquiring, maintaining and/or operating drainage machinery and equipment owned and operated or controlled by said Parish for drainage purposes, title to which shall be in the public? (estimated annual revenues: $300,000)

Race.SummaryText:
PARISHWIDE PROPOSITION
(MILLAGE RENEWAL) 
(PUBLIC BUILDINGS)

SUMMARY:  PARISHWIDE 10-YEAR 0.89-MILL TAX RENEWAL FOR CONSTRUCTING, REPAIRING, RENOVATING, EQUIPPING, MAINTAINING AND OPERATING PUBLIC BUILDINGS IN MOREHOUSE PARISH.
Race.FullText: Shall the Parish of Morehouse, State of Louisiana, under the provisions of Article VI, Sections 30 and 32 of the Constitution of the State of Louisiana of 1974, continue to levy and collect a special tax of eighty-nine hundredths (0.89) of one mill on all the property subject to taxation within said Parish, for a period of ten (10) years beginning with the year 2008 and ending with the year 2017, inclusive, for the purpose of constructing, repairing, renovating, equipping, maintaining and operating public buildings in Morehouse Parish, title to which shall be in the public? (estimated annual revenues: $120,000)

Race.SummaryText:
PARISHWIDE PROPOSITION
(MILLAGE)

SUMMARY:  PARISHWIDE 10-YEAR 0.50-MILL TAX FOR IMPROVING, OPERATING, MAINTAINING AND EQUIPPING THE MOREHOUSE PARISH EXTENSION OFFICE OF THE LSU AGRICULTURAL CENTER, INCLUDING 4-H YOUTH PROGRAMS AND ALL OTHER EDUCATIONAL PROGRAMS.
Race.FullText: Shall the Parish of Morehouse, State of Louisiana (the "Parish"), acting under the authority of La. R.S. 3:301, levy and collect a special ad valorem tax of one-half of one (0.50) mill, on all the property subject to taxation within the Parish, for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with the year 2007 and ending with the year 2016, for the purpose of improving, operating, maintaining and equipping the Morehouse Parish Extension Office of the LSU Agricultural Center, including 4-H youth programs and all other educational programs? (estimated annual revenues: $67,300)

Race.SpecificTitle: Hospital Svc. Dist. No. 1 -- Parishwide 5 Mills - BOC - 5 Yrs.
Race.SummaryText:
HOSPITAL SERVICE DISTRICT NO. 1 PROPOSITION
(MILLAGE)

SUMMARY:  5 YEAR, 5-MILLS PROPERTY TAX FOR OPERATING AND MAINTAINING HOSPITAL FACILITIES WITHIN SAID DISTRICT.
Race.FullText:
Shall Morehouse Parish Hospital Service District No. 1, State of Louisiana (the "District"), levy a five (5) mills tax on all property subject to taxation in said District (an estimated $625,000 reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the tax for an entire year), for a period of five (5) years, beginning with the year 2007 and ending with the year 2011, for the purpose of operating and maintaining hospital facilities within said District?
cquiring, maintaining and operating necessary equipment and furnishings for such facilities, said tax to be subject to homestead exemption as provided by law?

Race.SummaryText:
WARD TWO PROPOSITION
(MILLAGE RENEWAL) 

SUMMARY:  10-YEAR 2-MILL TAX RENEWAL IN WARD TWO OF MOREHOUSE PARISH, FOR THE ACQUISITION, MAINTENANCE AND UPKEEP OF PUBLIC CEMETERIES IN WARD TWO.
Race.FullText: Shall the Parish of Morehouse, State of Louisiana, (the "Parish"), under the authority conferred by La. R.S. 33:2740.45, and other constitutional and statutory authority, continue to levy and collect a special tax of two (2) mills on all the property subject to taxation in Ward Two of the Parish, for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with the year 2008 and ending with the year 2017, inclusive, for the maintenance and upkeep of public cemeteries in Ward Two of the Parish? (estimated annual revenues: $15,700)
